Sequence Information.Peptide Name: SFK (synthetic AMPs, conjugated peptide: staph-targeting sequence + temporin-SHf + K, XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature.Author: Wang T, Tan P, Tang Q, Zhou C, Ding Y, Xu S, Song M, Fu H, Zhang Y, Zhang X, Bai Y, Sun Z, Ma X. 2024
Literature.Title: Phage-displayed heptapeptide sequence conjugation significantly improves the specific targeting ability of antimicrobial peptides against Staphylococcus aureus.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (42.11%) toTemporin-SHfF: 21%, G=S: 16%, R: 11%.Activity: Active against S. aureus 1882 or 6538 (MIC 2-4 uM), S-epidermidis 12228 (MIC > 64 uM), E-coli 25922 (MIC > 64 uM), E. coli K88 or K99 (MIC 32-64 uM), P-aeruginosa 27853 or 15442 (MIC > 64 uM).
